website_summaries.verdict: A simple putting trainer that will challenge players to maintain their line and is perfect for practicing shorter putts.
pros: The parabolic arc of this putting trainer returns putts almost the same distance — so players don’t have to chase after the ball
Great for learning to control pace, alignment and aim
Compact enough to fit in a bag or a corner of the office
cons: Not the best device for practicing breaking putts

website_summaries.verdict: If you struggle to make short putts, this small trainer will help you develop the confidence you need.
pros: When working on your game at home or the office, this trainer simulates the stroke you need to follow for short putts
When you strike the putt correctly, the ball will return to you perfectly, while poorly struck putts fall away to the side, giving you feedback for successful shots
cons: Not really made to help with longer putts

customer_reviews.title: Simply and wonderfully engineered putting trainer
customer_reviews.text: Great putting training tool on the carpet. Haven't gotten a chance to use it on the putting green yet. Too cold/snowy in the NE. Gives instant feedback on a putt with too much pace or a putt that is just offline. Been using this everyday. Hopefully it will help with my abysmal putting on the greens.
customer_reviews.author: Ha Do

customer_reviews.title: Buy This Trainer!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super trainer for your putting. It is extremely challenging to get it to stay in the hole and it keeps you trying. I would say it is addictive but that might be overselling it just a bit. I will say you can hit 100 putts without even thinking about it. The target is so small and so precise that when you get on the green it is like putting into a barrel.
customer_reviews.author: Rowdy1

customer_reviews.title: The REAL one! Don't buy Chin@se stolen copies AMERICA
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful if you have the patience and willing to put in the time practicing. Making that perfect putt is bliss. I find myself doing it more and more now everytime I have a session. Don't skimp and buy the Chin@se knockoffs all over on Amazon! Hard to trust any of the products coming from there anymore. Search for any original item and you will see close copies from a few other sellers. Amazon shouldn't allow them to blatantly copy then steal every product we make and then store them in our warehouses (amazon) only to sell them much cheaper to OUR citizens. Only profit being made then is the CCP & Amazon! NOT AMERICA or AMERICANS!
customer_reviews.author: DanYolSon

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It's small and portable, which makes it easy to put down, practice putting, and clean up afterwards. I don't have any other putting trainers to compare this to, but I will say that it makes me want to practice. Also, the feedback of the "perfect putt" is pretty nice when you get it to stay in the hole. I can't say if this will help my putting in the long term or not, but it will likely keep me putting over the winter months when I can't play real golf.
customer_reviews.author: MRH

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: This device is so simple... if you set goals like how many times you can have your ball stick in the hole while using it you will get a lot of good putting practice in. It has to be the right speed and perfect aim. I love working with this and I have seen my putting on the course improve because of it
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and fun.tool. My putting confidence has improved.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful putting tool. It’s lightweight and effective. If your balls rolls up the ramp, you’ve made the putt. If it sticks in the hole, you’ve nailed the putt. If it rolls up and rolls back, that indicates how far beyond the hole you would have gone if you’d missed. It’s all fun and a good test. Thank your u
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Brugman

customer_reviews.title: Its ok for returning the ball...
customer_reviews.text: The "perfect putt" that catches in the hole is nearly impossible. I even tried to roll it into the hole with my hand from a foot away, to no avail. Do not buy this for anything besides a putt returner. Update: I am changing this to five stars because I tried it out a few more times and I actually caught the ball several times! I had to REALLY concentrate to put it right in the middle at the right speed. Which is exactly what is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Wildatnite

customer_reviews.title: The perfect putt
customer_reviews.text: This thing is no gimmick. This is not a paid review. It's a very simple design, but it does what it needs to. Allows you to practice putting anywhere and gives you the feedback you need. You will gain a lot of confidence in your stroke using this. I was able to tell that my stroke was pushing the ball and that my putter was actually too long. Next round I shaved at least 10 strokes off my game. Putting was always my weakest part of my game, not anymore. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Dayaw

customer_reviews.title: FUN LITTLE ITEM
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately we live close by some bocce and shuffleboard courts where we can practice, because it's kind of silly to practice anywhere else. We haven't been able to get a putted ball to stick dead center, but accurate putts are returned as advertised. Seems to work well new out of the box; will update if there are problems down the line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes it easy to practice
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use and makes me practice more. I use it on my carpet. It isn't the same as golf greens, but if it gets me to practice my stroke and read the speed of the carpets, it's good enough. The perfect putt hole is gimmicky, but whenever I make the perfect putt, it does make me happy, so can't complain. Don't really care about the shape or the fact that it returns putts a particular distance; I don't think it's accurate.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Dad Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad for his birthday. He's a huge golf fan and always putts on the carpet during the winter. He was just using a cup so this seemed like the perfect gift. As soon as he opened it, he wanted to try it out. He loved that you could use it as a hole or as a rebounder. Glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Chwalik

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I have just got back into golf. I bought this to practice the 4-5 foot putts for par that I have been missing. I use it in the house on a short carpet every night for about 15-20 min with my goal being 5 perfect putts. My confidence is way up and my scores are down which is great. I’ve got 3 kids and never have the time to get to the course to just practice putting, I would totally recommend. I’m going to buy the putting mat next to really dial it in.
customer_reviews.author: littleking

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars, but disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I thought using this trainer in my living room would have me on the PGA Tour in relatively short order, but it has not been able to get me there yet. Nevertheless, it's well constructed and will make some marginal improvements to your putting feel and speed control. Just don't get any big ideas about going pro.
customer_reviews.author: Nick S.

customer_reviews.title: Putting inside just got a whole lot easier
customer_reviews.text: Was purchased as a birthday gift. The recipient wasn't disappointed. He uses it all the time to practice his putt game, because we all know that you drive for show and putt for dough; that's what he tells me anyway! HAHAHAHA Perfect gift for the golfer who has everything golf related.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Works great with the PuttOut mat
customer_reviews.text: I use this with the PuttOut mat. I like how it returns the ball back a distance equal to how far it would have rolled past the hole had you missed. It's very hard to stick it into the small ball hole on the ramp -- your shot must be absolutely perfect. Aim small miss small as they say. This is an expensive piece of kit but it is well made. 4 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Just a great putting aid. Bought a putting mat and this and really my putting is so much better. You have to hit it dead straight to have a shot at it staying in. Not only does the speed have to be right, but also the roll. If contact is not clean, it won’t stick. I wondered if the speed that gets it to stick was actually ideal, and I think it is. It’s awesome!! Slightly costly for what it is, but quality is good and the value is in its effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Paul

customer_reviews.title: Nice Feedback
customer_reviews.text: This is a great training aid to help you practice your putting during the off season, indoors. It is actually great to use anytime and on the practice green! I am was so annoyed by missing the micro target, it kept me trying and I am now addicted! Gives you nice feedback!
customer_reviews.author: Robby

customer_reviews.title: Most Fun Putting Indoors in a Long Time!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most fun I've ever had putting indoors. More feedback other than just made/not made is helpful when you are really trying to fine tune putting skills. I find myself putting more and more putts into the PuttOut (I can't walk away until I get the ball to sit into that pesky hole!). I will be buying these as gifts. Thanks is due to Mark Crossfield.
customer_reviews.author: ACal

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t seen noticeable results
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two young competitive golfers to use to help with their putting. While they think it is fun to play with and try to get it in, I haven’t noticed any difference and they’re putting ability on an actual green.
customer_reviews.author: R and L

customer_reviews.title: This is a Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a game changer. It will polish your game without You even knowing it’s taking place, due to it feeling more like a game than a stale practice session of repetition. I’d suggest one of these long before any putting mat or automatic ball return. The Putt-Out is my best friend when it comes to practice aids. Don’t leave your practice game short, get one of your own ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the office
customer_reviews.text: Brought into the office so we can all practice putting. Maybe we are all awful at golf but it’s incredibly hard to land the ball in the small hole. It has a REALLY small window where both speed and accuracy need to be perfect or it rolls back. Very happy with it but can be frustrating. Not sure if it’ll translate to the course but fun toy
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: One of the best putting practice tools
customer_reviews.text: Being Canadian, I go through 6-7 months of garbage winter where I have the golf itch like crazy. There are indoor driving ranges which help my long game, but I have nothing to do in the winter to help my putting. The Putt Out is probably one of the coolest, simplest, training tools on the market. It helps me with strength of the putt, and the repetition helps my rhythm. What a great device to have if you want to inexpensively improve your putting.
customer_reviews.author: Dave D

customer_reviews.title: Love it for practicing my putting in the off season
customer_reviews.text: Perfect with puttout mat. Makes aiming for the perfect putt a fun challenge any advid golfer can get lost in. I've spent long periods of time practicing, and no matter how many times I do it, it is always enjoyable to nail the perfect putt. A great way to practice putting during the off season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing works
customer_reviews.text: The Putt Out works well, the feedback seems accurate. It's really hard to get the "perfect putt" that stays in the hole, very much feels like you must die it into the hole, and putts with some "authority" seem to fly over the back meaning you blasted that one well past the hole. It does help your focus.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good target
customer_reviews.text: This is a good target for indoor putting practice, but there should be a large award for hitting it dead-center so the golf ball stays in the depression like it's supposed to. It's not easy, but fun to keep trying - just like the goofy game of golf. If you can do it 5 times in a row you sould go pro!!!
customer_reviews.author: I expect quality

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and well built. Awesome putting aid.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but good things to say about this. It's built extremely well and feels solid when you fold/unfold it. It gives you a visual of the 'hole' to focus on, and the ball returning the distance you would have gone past the hole is so smart. The 'perfect putt' hole is very satisfying when you get it, but it does seem to effect the rollback distance, so I tend to keep it closed most of the time. Overall I couldn't be happier with it! Absolutely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle D. Gracey

customer_reviews.title: Crowd pleaser
customer_reviews.text: Everyone I show this to loves this putting tool. I got one for the house so the kids and I can use it and one for work. I also got the putt out carpet to go with it. I use the guide lines on the carpet to play games like horse or pig with the kids. My cat also likes to chase the ball up into the hole and make it stick.
customer_reviews.author: DadAzon

customer_reviews.title: An unnecessary gatget
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't work. I made a mistake. I was originally trusting all the good feedbacks that I read before purchasing the PuttOut, claiming that this device would help your putting skills, I did not try it before the return date. If you really decide to get this, give yourself a favor to try it immediatly to get your own opinion...
customer_reviews.author: Tina Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Very worthwhile purchase
customer_reviews.text: Have been using a few different aids in order to improve my game, but this one has got to be one of my favorites. Combined with the mat, this has caused me to really hone in and focus on my tempo and speed off the club face. Have spent a lot of time this summer and plan to spend more this winter using this to tune myself up for the start of next season.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Kepes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is the best putting aid I've used. The little hole really focuses your attention. You won't get the ball in there that often, but when you're focused on such a small target, and not the entire cup, you will make a ton of putts. It's great for your confidence and practice at home.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Those 4 footers aren't so bad now
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few weeks now, and I think it has certainly made me more confident on shorter putts. It's a fun little tool to use that gets addictive after awhile and makes it hard to put the putter down. Wonderful product that's a joy to use, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Great device for putting practice
customer_reviews.text: Everything is exactly as advertised and made well. Don't listen to the other reviews that say it's impossible to make the putts stay in the small hole. It's a great tool to improve your game!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Putting Training Aid
customer_reviews.text: Putt Out Trainer is a fantastic training aid. Allows you to putt to multiple targets on any surface. Great for speed training as getting the ball to stop in the perfect putt hole is a challenge that can become addicting. If you’re looking to improve your putting look no farther than the Putt Out Trainer
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for putting, but ball won't stay in the hole when I hit it. I do like the fact that the initial target is the same as a cup and It gives me confidence as I continue to hit it.
customer_reviews.author: R. McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea for a golfer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boss/cousin for Christmas. He loves golf and works extremely hard for a living as a chef. I bought this for him to use during the winter months and for some fun on his breaks. He loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya M Coccetti

customer_reviews.title: Great way to practice
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Helps work on your putting but with the added fun of the “perfect putt” makes it addicting. Lost some time to this already. Highly recommend for any golfers.
customer_reviews.author: Barry R

customer_reviews.title: Liking it more than I thought!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for putting practice! I use it indoors with my putting mat. And after using it a for a couple weeks, I felt more confident when putting on the greens outside. The idea of aiming small/smaller mistakes is a great thing to work on. I got the this putt trainer thinking it would be okay, but it's more addicting and fun. Also very satisfying when you get it in the hole!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Y.

customer_reviews.title: Best Putting Aid
customer_reviews.text: Best putting aid for indoor and outdoor on the green. Very simple to setup and use. Helps build a solid stroke, I use with a tempo app on the smart phone to build a consistent stroke, just 15mins couple times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Hiral Patel

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: This is so clever. My husband and I love it and it has helped our putting. Easy to Use and portable as well. Will be getting a couple more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Suze

customer_reviews.title: great training aid
customer_reviews.text: Great for indoor putting training and fun to kill time with, my only complaint is that the micro target for the "perfect putt" is incredibly difficult, like incredibly. i have had it for about a month and have done it maybe 15 times, but maybe thats why they call it that, is that the putt has to be absolutely "perfect"
customer_reviews.author: Aeroreviews

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a putting training device.
customer_reviews.text: I like the ability to use indoor because I got PuttOut during winter months; however it has a base that could be used out side on a putting green. The quick folding stores easily in the golf bag. In combination with the PuttOut mat gives great feed back on putting stroke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dad loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift for my dad and he loves it. It is very portable to take to the course. He also uses it at home to practice. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Product Box Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived and the product box was scratched and damaged. Disappointed because this is a Christmas gift and reluctant to return because i need a gift in two days. The box looks terrible For a gift.
customer_reviews.author: yogi

customer_reviews.title: Golf trainer
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, we could not get the golf ball to remain in the hole. Might have been our lack of golf skills. Ended up returning the project.
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA TOWNES

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: I like that this fits in my bag so I can just pop it out an practice any time I have a surface around. I also like that it rewards good shots in that the good ones come back, and I retrieve the off line ones. Positive reinforcement, brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: This is a fair putting tool
customer_reviews.text: This tool will work on helping you identify pulls or pushes, but you will never get the ball to stop in the hole.
customer_reviews.author: R. E. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Best putting tool
customer_reviews.text: I set this up at my work and my putts way more there then when I had it set up at home. Good practice for straight putts from 3-10 ft when you focus on getting the ball in the hole because your so focus on landing the ball inside
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Cool product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help putting game and it's a surprisingly helpful and fun device to practice with.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: The best putting aid you don't have.
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolute must-have for every golfer. I can stash this in just about any pocket in my golf bag and use it on the practice greens before I play. My putting has SIGNIFICANTLY improved since getting this. It's addictive enough for you to get in 15 minutes of putting and not even realize it. Just order it. (8 handicap)
customer_reviews.author: Carl H.

customer_reviews.title: Helps me a lot!!!
customer_reviews.text: Clean and good looking product. I’ve been using it for a couple of months now. I have the green mat to replicate a green speed. Putting with this has really helped me be more confident on the greens and lower my # of putts per round
customer_reviews.author: Lucho Romero

customer_reviews.title: I love this putting practice aid!
customer_reviews.text: This is simple, sturdy and fun to use! I have two - one at home and one in my office for long telephone conferences. My putting is improving dramatically!
customer_reviews.author: Texan

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Checkout the Abco Tech Indoor Golf Putting Green instead.
customer_reviews.author: James S Spore IV

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This had been a great tool to use to practice my putting. It's nice to be able to work on my game while the weather is not cooperating. We like to have competitions to see who can get it to stay in the fewest tries.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lyxis

customer_reviews.title: Not really that useful.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, but after using it a bit I realized that it wasn't all that useful; at least for me. I could just putt to a spot and see how far past the spot the ball went. Maybe if used in conjunction with a putting mat it might be better. Though keep in mind that if your putt is off-line, it flies off the edge of the Trainer.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L.

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: My units micro target doesn’t have the black emblem with the P on it as the picture shows, it’s just clear. Great product but very disappointed in the deception of what the picture shows and what I received.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Putt
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome training aid. Started using this the day it arrived and it has already helped me to keep my putter head on line better than ever before. I do agree with many that getting the ball in the perfect putt hole is addictive (and when you do, you want to brag to the whole house). Bottom line awesome training aid.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Aker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent putting practice tool
customer_reviews.text: Excellent putting practice tool. I use it frequently when I can't get out to the course to practice on real greens. It really helps with alignment and speed control. It is shocking to see how far past the hole the ball would have traveled.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I live this thing. Rolls the ball back to you, and trains the eye pretty well for the look of the hole on the green ( not perfectly because the white color of the cup in the hole in the green is always not a perfect circle to look at because it is sunken). Folds compactly. I live it!
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Toenjes

customer_reviews.title: Good learning tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband because he loves to putt at home. He absolutely loved it. It is a good training tool for learning how to put straight.
customer_reviews.author: Gay Smith

customer_reviews.title: Portable Putting Training
customer_reviews.text: Great design. Gives you immediate feedback on your putts. You can move it around anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Vikingtwin

customer_reviews.title: Fun training for the putter
customer_reviews.text: This is great for anyone interested in improving their putter stroke.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Menzel

customer_reviews.title: If you practice there's no way you wont improve
customer_reviews.text: I ended up purchasing two, one for the office and the house. It has been a great aid and I can see the results in my games. Even my group has commented how solid I've become and I'm much more confident on the greens. Great great practice aid.
customer_reviews.author: gregory simons

customer_reviews.title: Yes, you should by this...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing. I practice every night at home now, and my putting has improved greatly because of it. Sometimes I bring it into work and the friendly competition begins as everyone tries to see how many putts they make before getting to ball to stop up in the perfect putt hole on the ramp. Well worth the money, and a great gift for anyone who likes to golf.
customer_reviews.author: Peter T

customer_reviews.title: Make putting practice fun!
customer_reviews.text: Makes putting practice much easier and even fun! When you accurately putt the ball, the ball returns a short distance toward you due to the object's shape--unless you made a perfect stroke. Then the ball settles in the hole to give you that perfect feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Practicality
customer_reviews.text: While it is a good product, I've had very minimal ones that stayed in the hole. All of the putts would drop that don't stay in the whole. So practicality isn't there
customer_reviews.author: wackums

customer_reviews.title: crooked, doesnt work well on my floor. Should invest in putting mat instead
customer_reviews.text: Wish i had opened this product earlier because it does not work well. Barely sticks to my floor. WIsh I would have bought a putting mat instead. Not great for practice.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Effective but expensive
customer_reviews.text: It's really nice. Works as expected. Maybe a little expensive for what you are buying. There are other cheaper ones that look similar.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it for my daughter and she loves it, easy to use great for indoor practice. Maybe she can let Me borrow it some time! Lol! Anyways great product she put it away in her golf bag!
customer_reviews.author: Erik Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Difficult but fun
customer_reviews.text: This is difficult, as it is supposed to be, but it is also a lot of fun. My gf even enjoys trying to make putts in it and she really isn't much of a golfer.
customer_reviews.author: LeRoy D. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Another great put practice tool
customer_reviews.text: Another great put practice tool. Whether on the practice green or my home green, this is a great tool which has turned into a fun game. My putting has benefited from this trainer.
customer_reviews.author: MidwestNice

customer_reviews.title: unfold and go
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy, can fold and go with you, this was a great idea
customer_reviews.author: King O. Simpkins

customer_reviews.title: Valentine Gift
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my husband. So not sure how to rate it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Putting training turns into a fun game
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend. He loves it. Great to practice with and he really enjoys the game aspect of it. Pretty difficult to get the "perfect putt". Great overall and highly recommend for golf lovers!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Mayhan

customer_reviews.title: Relatively Expensive but works as describee
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. Collapses flat and expands easily. Works as described.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my brother-in-law and he absolutely raves about it! Has spent many hours putting. Money well spent to make someone happy.
customer_reviews.author: Debora Huff

customer_reviews.title: Great putting tool!
customer_reviews.text: The PuttOut trainer is a great tool, perfect for putting indoors. My putting has improved quite a bit and I only use it for about 10 minutes a day, 3 or 4 days a week. Its built well and fun to practice with!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great compact golf training tool for putting.
customer_reviews.text: Great compact golf training tool for putting. Works exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: W33P

customer_reviews.title: This is a Fantastic training aid
customer_reviews.text: This is a Fantastic training aid! It's not easy and It took me 70+ tries before I got one to stick but It gets you to focus on something other than the cup. The great thing is you can use it at the Practice green. Great Great Great. Can't say enough good things about it.
customer_reviews.author: Will I AM burwick

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheaply made but is a great training tool
customer_reviews.text: Great for golf practice very satisfying to hit the mark. However, wish the product was a bit more “expensively” made... looked very cheap as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Spiderpig

customer_reviews.title: Super fun
customer_reviews.text: I use this at the edge of an indoor green called the Putt-about. its an awesome combination.
customer_reviews.author: David Adam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome practice tool
customer_reviews.text: Great for the house or office. I will definitely gift these to some of my golf buddies and family members.
customer_reviews.author: Brian E. Rietveld

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: This has really helped me fix my misses. I now have the ability to regroove my stroke.
customer_reviews.author: Surveyor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is helpful in perfecting my ability to properly align the club to the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great for a golfer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother for Christmas and he loves it. Small so you can bring it anywhere and he loves that the ball comes back to you. He said it has helped his putting game because you have to hit it perfectly in order to land in the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Weber

customer_reviews.title: Great for putting practice
customer_reviews.text: It is challenging and fun for the the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: hippy

customer_reviews.title: Great Trainer for Speed Control
customer_reviews.text: Great trainer for putting to enhance feel and speed control.
customer_reviews.author: Norm Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Part of arsinal but not first choice.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it and used it. I'm a 6 handicap btw. Would I buy it again? No. Would I recommend it as a first or even second putting trainer? No. Do I still break it out and use it every now and then. Yes. It is effective. I would first buy an indoor putting matt and for the course a putting mirror. It's an ok third choice putting aid.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Tepper

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should, you have to put perfectly for the ball to stay in the hole which helps you learn the strength of your strike
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t return this until you you give it a week’s worth of practice!
customer_reviews.text: I almost returned this because I thought it was too hard at first. After a few days I got it. I now understand how this helps you putt past the hole but just enough. Also it forces you to be super accurate directionally too. It’s great!
customer_reviews.author: ed6800

customer_reviews.title: This actually works
customer_reviews.text: I have the putting mat and the Put Out Pressure Putt Trainer. Its great and returns balls depending on how hard you hit the putt, this gives a good feel for distance. The "perfect Putt" hole actually works, if you hit exactly the correct line and speed the ball gets stuck in the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Something your golfer might actually use
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to buy something for my golfer that he'll actually use. He wins enough pro shop money to get what he wants. The reviews were great and the cost was low. So I ordered it. Something your golfer may not have... It seems to be a great product and he uses it regularly
customer_reviews.author: K. Belis

customer_reviews.title: yes it is nice piece of equipment but color is hard to see ...
customer_reviews.text: yes it is nice piece of equipment but color is hard to see on my carpet. Hope have different colors too.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: But it!  With the putting green though...
customer_reviews.text: Buy it with the putting green. Don’t buy it without. The combination has cut 8 strokes from my game.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great for the house
customer_reviews.text: Awesome trainer. Better than most other aides out there and folds up small. Makes a great gift
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved it. Not a great putter and bless is heart for trying to be better. He has set up on the back of the deck.
customer_reviews.author: schelly

customer_reviews.title: Great putting aide
customer_reviews.text: I have a 14’x5′ piece of synlawn pro putt in a high traffic area at home (no hole). Before this I used to hit 14 balls in several different drills (speed drills and putt at a quarter). With Puttout I use one ball and because it’s coming back to me I get many more reps per time invested. This is so simple it’s brilliant. Working to get the ball to stop in the hole increases concentration and promotes calm hands for solid contact in the sweet spot.
customer_reviews.author: Gollie

customer_reviews.title: PuttOut great trainer
customer_reviews.text: Very nice trainer. Use in combination with working a line and your in business.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Davis

customer_reviews.title: Pricey plastic
customer_reviews.text: Moves around a bit. Not super stable. For the money there are better return systems out there.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bjork

customer_reviews.title: This is a great way to practice your alighnment onyour putting.
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful practicing my putting when I can't get outside. It works very well on smooth carpet. It's compact so you take it where ever you go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUST LIKE ON TV
customer_reviews.text: This item is just like you see it on TV or youtube when you watch some YouTube channel review or PRO use it.... a great training aid.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

product_meta.title: PuttOut Pressure Putt Trainer - Perfect Your Golf Putting
feature_bullets: This training aid is designed to simulate the exact conditions of putting into a real hole on the green by it's ground-breaking parabolic curved design
Each successful putt is returned the same distance it would have gone past the hole if it had missed - great feedback for getting the pace just right.
Designed to return good putts and reject bad ones.
Made from high quality, elastomer and translucent polycarbonate, PuttOUT folds and fits into your golf bag.
Build repetition into your practice to improve your pace putting and to practice pressure putting.
